directions: Place the tomatoes, red onion, cilantro, jalapeno pepper, salt, black pepper, garlic, and lime juice into a large mixing bowl. Pour in the vinegar and vegetable oil, and gently mix to combine. Cover, and refrigerate 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1 large red onion, cut into 1/4-inch dice
title: Chef Scott's Pico de Gallo
